name: Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers (1998)
name_original: Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers (1998)
description:
Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers (1998) is a game developed by MicroProse Software. It came out on 14-01-1998. MicroProse published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers (1998) on PC.
